name: Stardust Puzzle
description:
A simple puzzle game featuring my pony OC Stardust Stellar. :3

用我的OC星辰‧恆恆做的簡單拼圖遊戲。 XD

Change log:
1.0.3
Fixed crash bug when you try to move nonexistent a puzzle piece. (drag from outside)

1.0.2
Only mouse left-click can move a puzzle piece.

1.0.1
Fixed crash bug when move a puzzle piece out board.

1.0
First release
